message: I'm excited to offer you this great product at a competitive price. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but that price is a little high for me. Would you consider a lower price?
I understand you're looking for a better price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we discuss a price of $11,000?
I appreciate you coming down a bit, Alice.  To be honest, I have a strict budget for this purchase. Would you be willing to settle at $9,500?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $10,000, but I need to make a profit. Can we discuss a price of $10,500?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $10,000 is my absolute limit for this purchase. If you're willing to meet that, I'll buy it today.

I appreciate your commitment to $10,000, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at that price, but I'll throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. How about we say $9,800 and I'll include some additional support services?
